name: medicationrequest-forShipboardHazard
description: During Outpatient Pharmacy order entry, a pharmacist may be asked if the medication being prescribed is for a condition related to PROJ 112/SHAD while in the military. This field will store the pharmacist's response to this question. The value in this field will be used to evaluate whether or not a copay should be applied to the prescription. This value will also be used as a default should this question be raised again during the life of the prescription.
